gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19139 Geographic Information - Metadata - Implementation Specification

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Impaired Streams on the 303(d) List of 2006: Indiana, 2006

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Indiana Department of Environmental Management, Office of Water Quality
Indiana Department of Environmental Management, Office of Water (Data creator)

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This 2006 303(d) list of impaired streams represents the streams, and rivers, that are eligible for the development of Total Maximum Daily Load limits. There are fields for each parameter for which the water body may be impaired. These boolean fields allow for easy legend queries on each parameter or sets of parameters. Twenty-four listed streams that are included in the data table (indicated by 0 values for Dur_id, T_meas, Rch_date) do not have topology so that they do not show in the line features and will not query from the view or with theme queries; only table queries. All impaired lakes represented by polygons are contained in a separate shapefile called IMPAIRED_LAKES_IDEM_IN. These shapefiles must be used together to view all waters listed on the 303d report.

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: This data layer was developed to communicate the location and extent of the listed impaired streams as determined by the TMDL Committee and Technical Staff. The shapefile illustrates the impaired streams for display at public meetings, to include in reports and to use for comparison over time.

gmd:credit.gco:CharacterString: Indiana Department of Environmental Management, Office of Water Quality 2006, 303(d)-listed-streams

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: All impaired lakes represented by polygons are contained in a separate shapefile called IMPAIRED_LAKES_IDEM_IN. These shapefiles must be used together to view all waters listed on the 303(d) report. This product is distributed "AS-IS" without warranties of any kind, either expressed or implied, including but not limited to warranties of suitability of a particular purpose or use. No attempt has been made in either the designed format or production of these data to define the limits or jurisdiction of any federal, state, or local government. These data are intended for use only at the published scale or smaller and are for reference purposes only. They are not to be construed as a legal document or survey instrument. A detailed on-the-ground survey and historical analysis of a single site may differ from this data.

No claims to accuracy are made on this data. It is intended to be used only for general planning purposes. Detailed planning or analysis will require more accurate data. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY The product is provided "AS IS", without any other warranties or conditions, expressed or implied, including, but not limited to, warranties for product quality, or suitability to a particular purpose or use. The maximum aggregate liability to the original purchaser shall not exceed the amount paid by you for the product.

gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: This file is available to anyone, but access may be contingent on written request, specific terms relevant to the agency or person making the request, and (or) current freedom of information statutes in the state of Indiana.

gmd:environmentDescription.gco:CharacterString: ESRI ArcGIS version 9.2 shapefile format, approximately 9.4 Mb

gmd:supplementalInformation.gco:CharacterString: All impaired lakes represented by polygons are contained in a separate shapefile called IMPAIRED_LAKES_IDEM_IN. These shapefiles must be used together to view all waters listed on the 303d report. The level of editing done by BLA is fully disclosed in the process steps of this metadata; credit for the information is retained by the originator.

gmd:measureDescription.gco:CharacterString: This data set was provided by IDEM personnel and is assumed to be accurate.

Unknown. No records exist at Bernardin, Lochmueller & Associates regarding the attribute accuracy of this shapefile. For more information, contact Jody Arthur, 305(b)/303(d) Coordinator, Indiana Department of Environmental Management, (jarthur@dem.state.in.us), 317-234-1424. Twenty four segments are listed in the table but not given topology to appear in the objects in the view. This file must be used with its companion IMPAIRED_LAKES_IDEM_IN shapefile to obtain a full assessment of impaired waters.

Unknown. No records exist at Bernardin, Lochmueller & Associates regarding the attribute accuracy of this shapefile. For more information, contact Jody Arthur, 305(b)/303(d) Coordinator, Indiana Department of Environmental Management, (jarthur@dem.state.in.us), 317-234-1424.

Unknown. No records exist at Bernardin, Lochmueller & Associates regarding the attribute accuracy of this shapefile. For more information, contact Jody Arthur, 305(b)/303(d) Coordinator, Indiana Department of Environmental Management, Office of Water Quality (jarthur@dem.state.in.us), 317-234-1424.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: The ESRI ArcGIS shapefile named "In_303d2006_utm_streams.shp" containing the 303(d) impaired streams were delivered to BLA personnel on March 15, 2007. In_303d2006_utm_streams.shp was loaded into ArcGIS 9.2 and renamed "IMPAIRED_STREAMS06_IDEM_IN." The attribute fields "OID_," "State," and "County" were deleted.

This metadata was pre-parsed and parsed using CNS (Chew and Spit, v 2.6.1) and MP (Metadata Parser, v 2.7.1) software written by Peter N. Schweitzer (United States Geological Survey). The errors generated by MP were all addressed and corrected.
Listing of all impaired waters eligible for TMDL limits

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Indiana Department of Environmental Management, Office of Water Quality
Indiana Department of Environmental Management, Office of Water Quality

gmd:otherCitationDetails.gco:CharacterString: 2004 303(d) list is available from IDEM's TMDL Web site.

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Indiana Department of Environmental Management, Office of Water Quality
Indiana Department of Environmental Management, Office of Water Quality

gmd:otherCitationDetails.gco:CharacterString: This file must be used in conjunction with the companion IMPAIRED_LAKES_IDEM_IN shapefile to get a full count of all impaired waters.

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: This metadata file is intended to accompany the data set identified and received from the BLA/IGS. It should not to be altered or summarized. BLA/IGS does not support secondary distribution. If this data set was received from anyone besides the BLA/IGS, this metadata file and the data set it describes may lack integrity.

gmd:maintenanceNote.gco:CharacterString: Metadata was created as or translated to ISO 19139 for inclusion in the Big Ten Academic Alliance Geoportal.
